programme.title: ABC News (2024)
programme.desc: Ruby Cornish presents the latest from ABC News, following todays top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, expert analysis and all the updated news, sport, weather and information you need.

programme.title: Comeback - Shayna Jack
programme.desc: From vilified drug cheat to Olympic gold, Shayna Jacks extraordinary return to the pool.

programme.title: Day 51: 2 People Remain
programme.desc: After 50 days, only two remain. They have no idea how many others are left, let alone that they are the final two. The weather brings a change for the worse, and a change of strategy to survive could make or break them.

programme.title: The Chefs Garden S1
programme.desc: Chef Massimo Melo discovers Tasmanias fresh local produce along with his beloved recipes, from Italian homely gnocchi made from scratch to exquisite abalone caught fresh from the sea.

programme.title: Aussie Bull Catchers S1
programme.desc: On the eve of their first pay day, Liz and Willie draft their cattle but come up painfully short. Legendary outback ringer, Kurt Hammar has built a $40 million dollar empire. At the Katherine show, Kurt flexes his muscles.

programme.title: Coral Coast
programme.desc: The Great Barrier Reef is the only place in the world where ancient rainforests meet a tropical reef, with the coastal fringe supporting a variety of unique wildlife.

programme.title: Fitzroy
programme.desc: In Fitzroy, now one of Melbournes most desirable suburbs. Greig Pickhaver discovers that a few decades ago it was a slum before becoming home to European migrants post war looking for cheap rents and a sense of community.

programme.title: ABC News (2024)

programme.title: Pat Turner
programme.desc: Pat Turner works with politicians to improve health outcomes for Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islanders but her life began in Mparntwe (Alice Springs). She shares stories of how activists before her shaped who she is today.

programme.title: Landline (2024)
programme.desc: A look back at some of the best stories from Landline in 2024. The brothers behind the largest organically certified land parcel in the world; and what happened to the El Nino? Presented by Pip Courtney.

programme.title: ABC News Regional (2024)
programme.desc: Take a closer look at whats making headlines in regional and rural Australia. ABC News reporters uncover the news and unique stories about whats really going on outside the big cities. Presented by Amy Culpitt.

programme.title: Evandale, TAS
programme.desc: Heather Ewart swaps four wheels for two - with mixed results - when she heads to Evandale in Tasmania, Australias home of penny farthing races. (Season Final)

programme.title: Come Together
programme.desc: Narelda Jacobs is a Whadjuk Noongar woman and TV presenter. With Australia on the cusp of a referendum, Narelda goes on a journey to learn when our nation has come together for Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander people.

programme.title: Cambodia
programme.desc: Dr Ann Jones travels through the Indo-Pacific region to find the dedicated people bringing our planets amazing animals, plants and ecosystems back from the brink. This time she visits biodiversity-rich Cambodia.

programme.title: News Breakfast (2024)
programme.desc: Be the first to know the latest overnight developments, breaking news and the days top stories. Michael Rowland and Bridget Brennan bring you news and interviews, joined by Emma Rebellato, Charles Brice and Nate Byrne.

programme.title: ABC News Mornings (2024)
programme.desc: When big stories break, turn to Gemma Veness in the morning to bring you whats happening and why it matters. ABC News has more reporters in more places, serving and connecting communities and telling your stories.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon (2024)
programme.desc: The leading news at lunchtime. Ros Childs brings you the days top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and around the world reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: Fraction of the Cost
programme.desc: Want fabulous food for a fraction of the cost? Comedian Adam Spencer and Every Night Of The Weeks Lucy Tweed are with Adam to run the numbers.

programme.title: Strath Creek, VIC
programme.desc: Michael McCoy revisits a garden built after the owners lost their original property in a horror bushfire. (Season Final)

programme.title: The Birth of the Burbs (1945 -1960)
programme.desc: The end of WW2 marks the beginning of radical transformations to Australias housing landscape - social, cultural and architectural history is about to unfold in ways never before seen on this vast continent.

programme.title: Cambodia and Laos
programme.desc: Landline visits South-East Asia where a unique charity in Cambodia gives cows to farmers in return for sending their children to school. In Laos a dairys buffalo rental scheme is helping lift families out of poverty.

programme.title: Yumi Stynes
programme.desc: Yumi Stynes is a broadcaster, writer and mother-of-four whos carved out a 20-year media career through speaking her mind - while weathering social media storms along the way. She sits down with Jane Hutcheon.

programme.title: Cheap Thrills
programme.desc: Syafa dan Pink Azwan menjelajah hampir seluruh semenanjung Malaysia mencari tempat-tempat yang sesuai untuk healing dan menjenguk lokasi di mana kita boleh shopping barang-barang yang tak lapuk dek zaman.

programme.title: Oh Baby Remy!
programme.desc: Remy Ishak bakal menjadi bapa kepada seorang bayi lelaki . Bersama isterinya, Ezza, Kita akan lihat Remy melakukan kesilapan, berkelakuan seperti newbie and transformasi Remy dalam semua aspek kehidupannya.

programme.title: Derita Untuk Bahagia
programme.desc: Alisha menjadi mangsa kerana keluarga ibu bapanya tidak memberikan restu. Dia menderita sejak kecil dan hampir dibunuh serta dibuang ke tempat pembuangan sampah.

programme.title: Aku Bukan BIMBO
programme.desc: Elsuraya percaya Azad adalah punca kematian ibu bapanya dalam satu kemalangan dan membenci lelaki itu yang dalam diam mencintainya. Perkara sebenar disimpan rapi oleh Azad dan sahabat baiknya, Dani Ikram.

programme.title: Man Laksa
programme.desc: Man Laksa, pemuda yang pemalu menjalani hidup sederhana dengan menjual laksa di kampungnya. Dia menaruh hati pada gadis bernama Chah, namun tidak berbuat apa-apa kerana Chah adalah anak ketua kampung.

programme.title: Roda Panas
programme.desc: Roda Panas menunjukkan dunia automotif mengenai enjin, roda dan aktiviti yang berkaitan.

programme.title: Fantasy Escape
programme.desc: Sebuah program yang merealisasikan impian peminat bertuah untuk melakukan aktiviti yang mereka gemari bersama selebriti pilihan mereka yang turut berkongsi pengalaman dan memberi motivasi.

programme.title: Jodoh-Jodoh Annisa
programme.desc: Berkisarkan konflik keluarga dan percintaan. Annisa terpaksa menempuh jalan hidup yang berliku baik dalam kerjaya dan percintaan. Dugaan hidup memaksa Annisa memilih antara lima jejaka.

programme.title: Ini Malam Kita Punya
programme.desc: Rancangan bual bicara yang akan di hoskan oleh Nabil Ahmad yang akan mengetengahkan sketch lawak dan temu bual bersama artis-artis terkenal Malaysia

programme.title: RAI
programme.desc: Sebuah rancangan yang memaparkan kisah-kisah masyarakat setempat

programme.title: Super Spontan Tepi Jalan
programme.desc: Saksikan rancangan komedi spontan yang pasti menghiburkan anda sekeluarga

programme.title: Ragam Cucu and Atuk
programme.desc: Dhia terpaksa tinggal bersama atuk and neneknya di kampung kerana ibu bapanya ke luar negara atas urusan kerja. Perkara itu amat mengujakan Dhia kerana dia suka untuk meluangkan masa bersama atuknya.

programme.title: Sukan Pejabat
programme.desc: Sebuah sitcom game show yang paling tidak adil di dunia dan memang tidak akan adil seperti realiti kehidupan di pejabat andamungkin?

programme.title: Girlfriend Aku Dari Neraka the Series
programme.desc: Kisah mengenai seorang jejaka bernama Rudi, yang merupakan seorang player dan sering kali bertukar teman wanita. Dia kemudian telah jatuh cinta dengan seorang gadis yang diidamkan. Pelbagai usaha telah dilakukan olehnya untuk memikat hati gadis tersebut dan dapatkah dia memihat hati gadis tersebut?

programme.title: Lawak Ke Dik?
programme.desc: Program untuk kanak-kanak bagi menyuarakan pendapat dan berkongsi buah fikiran mereka secara spontan.

programme.title: Kiah Pekasam
programme.desc: Mengisahkan tentang Kiah yang sangat jujur di dalam percakapannya memulakan kehidupan baru di kampungnya.

programme.title: Kiah Pekasam
programme.desc: Mengisahkan tentang Kiah yang sangat jujur di dalam percakapannya memulakan kehidupan baru di kampungnya.

programme.title: Bonda Bonding
programme.desc: Artis terpilih setiap minggu akan melakukan pelbagai aktiviti bersama bonda mereka. Saksikan detik istimewa mereka ini

programme.title: 27 Hari Mencari Mustafa
programme.desc: 10 tahun yang lepas, Mustafa menghilangkan diri setelah isterinya difitnah oleh ayahnya. Kini, ibunya tenat dan ayahnya terpaksa membuang egonya untuk mencari Mustafa di Chennai.

programme.title: Dalang Prank
programme.desc: Sebuah rancangan hiburan prank yang melibatkan artis dan peserta yang menjadi dalang kepada prank masing-masing. Prank yang disukai oleh penonton akan dinobatkan Juara Dalang Prank dalam setiap episod.

programme.title: Jihan Show
programme.desc: Riuh rendah dibuatnya apabila Jihan berkumpul dengan teman-teman. Pelbagai topik jadi perbualan bila semua "girlfriends" bersatu.

programme.title: Makhluk Manis Dalam Bis
programme.desc: Pertemuan pertama Emil dengan Gaby di dalam bas, seorang gadis manis misteri yang dia panggil Sweet Creatures. Sejak itu Emil berusaha mencari keberadaan Gaby, yang tinggal bersama datuknya.

programme.title: Betul Ke Bohong? S7
programme.desc: Betul Ke Bohong? musim ketujuh membawa Johan sebagai hos dan Ray, Haniff, Angah dan Achey sebagai kapten kumpulan, Nantikan siapa artis jemputan untuk minggu ini

programme.title: JOZAN
programme.desc: Duo pelawak paling popular kini kembali setelah 7 tahun tidak bersama menghiburkan peminat menerusi program bual bicara terbaru yang pasti menghiburkan anda.

programme.title: Seminggu Sekali
programme.desc: Bersama Douglas Lim and Adibah Noor, saksikan mereka mengupas dan menyampaikan isu semasa kepada masyarakat secara santai dan lucu.

programme.title: Ngaroot Ngaroot
programme.desc: Sebuah sketsa yang menampilkan finalis MLM 2017 membawakan watak lucu yang bertemakan isu semasa. Selain itu, program ini turut memaparkan nilai murni dan pengajaran yang berguna buat penonton.

programme.title: Super Game Boy The Series
programme.desc: Danial dan kawan-kawannya Ayu, Bob dan Nina kembali beraksi dengan gelagat mereka yang lucu dan menarik. Berjayakah misi mereka di dalam setiap episod? Jom kita saksikannya.

programme.title: Mana Satu
programme.desc: Rancangan memasak yang menguji suami selebriti mengenali masakan isterinya atau tidak. Isteri perlu memasak untuk suaminya tetapi dalam masa yang sama selebriti jemputan juga akan memasak menu yang sama.

programme.title: Arena Panas : Pro VS Bro S1
programme.desc: Bersama barisan atlit handal dan selebriti popular tanah air, sakasikan mereka berentap dalam acara sukan dan permainan menghiburkan anda.

programme.title: Life At Thinker
programme.desc: Life At Thinker adalah sebuah program vlog atau diari yang memaparkan aktiviti-aktiviti menarik dan kegilaan krew-krew Thinker Studios di sepanjang minggu.

programme.title: Isteri VS Tunang
programme.desc: Alana Sofea mencabar keegoan Zaim Azfar sehingga mereka berkahwin. Puas dapat menyahut cabaran Alana, Zaim kembali menjalin hubungan dengan bekas kekasihnya, Amira Irdina.

programme.title: Heaven Falling
programme.desc: The team helps Remy try to catch his brothers real killer 25 years after Mikey was murdered.

programme.title: Jake
programme.desc: When Tess (Dolly Lewis) inserts herself into Jakes (Daniel Gillies) investigation to find the identity of a dead John Doe, she confronts conflicting emotions - fearing for her brother Lucas (Alec Santos) life while driven to do the thing she loves most: solve the case.

programme.title: NCIS: Origins (Season 1)
programme.desc: In the series, Gibbs starts his career as a newly minted special agent at the fledgling NCIS Camp Pendleton office where he forges his place on a gritty, ragtag team led by NCIS legend Mike Franks.

programme.title: Spider-Man
programme.desc: Average teenager Peter Parker is transformed into an extraordinary super hero after he is accidentally bitten by a radioactive spider.

programme.title: Blood Bank
programme.desc: When NCIS investigates a shootout on a boat in which a rare cultural artifact is stolen, theyre shocked to learn who owns the boat.

programme.title: A Long Time Coming
programme.desc: While Agent Rountree and Fatima are searching for Kilbride, who has been MIA, they are ambushed and learn that every member of the team has a $200,000 bounty on their head via the dark web.

programme.title: Hail Mary
programme.desc: Vo goes undercover when the Fly Team investigates the mysterious death of an American model in Milan. Also, Kellett is caught off guard when Dandridge arrives looking for visibility on the case.

programme.title: Home

programme.title: Yessir, The Pink City
programme.desc: Teams travel more than 2,000 miles from Vietnam to India where they must balance traditional pots on their heads while performing a folk dance, and assemble a life-size, three-dimensional mural.

programme.title: Driving Head On Into Scooters
programme.desc: For the first time in The Amazing Race history, the votes for the mandatory U-turn are in, and one team must complete both detours in India, bundling up flowers and transporting building materials on rickshaws in the bustling streets of Jaipur.

programme.title: Spider-Man 3
programme.desc: In Spider-Man 3, based on the legendary Marvel Comics series, Peter Parker has finally managed to strike a balance between his devotion to M.J. and his duties as a superhero.

programme.title: Nuth0uz
programme.desc: John and Quiet make a pitstop, where John reunites with a former contact; Sweet Tooth bonds with a new follower.

programme.desc: John is faced with the ultimate decision with honoring his past or embracing his future.

programme.title: Resident Evil: Apocalypse
programme.desc: In this sequel to the hit Resident Evil: Apocalypse, Alice (Milla Jovovich) awakens from a deep sleep to find her worst fear realized? The bloodthirsty Undead, a lethal virus that she and a now annihilated squad of elite military fought to destroy, have been unleashed on Raccoon City.

programme.title: The Moving Badge

programme.title: Rolys First Day
programme.desc: As Roly makes his usual noise in the Clubhouse, Duggee and the Squirrels reminisce about how completely different Roly was when he first arrived.

programme.title: The Spot the Difference Badge
programme.desc: Duggee looks different, but what is it? By playing some looking games, the Squirrels learn how best to spot the difference.

programme.title: Happys First Day
programme.desc: Happy has always loved the water. But while swimming around in his paddling pool at the playhouse, Duggee reminds the Squirrels that there was a time when Happy feared water!

programme.title: The Library Badge
programme.desc: When the Squirrels cant figure out if fish have noses, Duggee shows them his library. But when the Squirrels realise no-one is visiting it, they have an idea...

programme.desc: The Squirrels are having fun trying out games but are surprised to find out that Betty didnt always enjoy playing.

programme.desc: Duggee is making a smoothie. The Squirrels cant agree on whether they like it or not!

programme.title: The Biology Badge
programme.desc: Duggee and the Squirrels hop inside the Biology Bus and miniaturize themselves.

programme.title: The Puddle Badge
programme.desc: Happy sets his sights on a questionable looking puddle that he is determined to splash in!

programme.title: Norries First Day
programme.desc: Norrie skips into the Clubhouse and greets her friends. As they greet her, they reminisce about when they first met.

programme.title: The Moving Badge
programme.desc: Snail is thrilled to be moving house as she wishes to escape the wet and sploshy place she currently calls home to a more spacious house on the hill.

programme.title: Rolys First Day
programme.desc: As Roly makes his usual noise in the Clubhouse, Duggee and the Squirrels reminisce about how completely different Roly was when he first arrived.

programme.title: The Spot the Difference Badge
programme.desc: Duggee looks different, but what is it? By playing some looking games, the Squirrels learn how best to spot the difference.

programme.title: Happys First Day
programme.desc: Happy has always loved the water. But while swimming around in his paddling pool at the playhouse, Duggee reminds the Squirrels that there was a time when Happy feared water!

programme.title: The Library Badge
programme.desc: When the Squirrels cant figure out if fish have noses, Duggee shows them his library. But when the Squirrels realise no-one is visiting it, they have an idea...

programme.title: Tags First Day
programme.desc: The Squirrels are crafting in the Clubhouse when Betty saves Tag from throwing water across the table instead of glitter.

programme.title: The Hat Badge
programme.desc: King Tiger interrupts the Squirrels quiet time when he turns up to the Clubhouse with a magic hat on instead of his crown.

programme.title: Bettys First Day
programme.desc: The Squirrels are having fun trying out games but are surprised to find out that Betty didnt always enjoy playing.

programme.title: The Choreography Badge
programme.desc: The Squirrels meet Duggees old dance crew and learn that he was kicked out because he couldnt stick to the choreography. The Squirrels are surprised because Duggee is such a good dancer!

programme.title: The Pet Badge
programme.desc: The Squirrels meet a scruffelump in the woods, and despite Duggees reservations, take him in. But they soon learn the responsibilities of taking care of a pet.

programme.title: The Lost Property Badge
programme.desc: The Squirrels lose Tag in the Clubhouse but to find him theyre going to have to figure out where the Lost Property room is.

programme.title: The Mountain Badge
programme.desc: The Squirrels need to rescue Enid when they see her at the top of the Mighty Sugar Bun Mountain.

programme.title: The Accessory Badge
programme.desc: The Squirrels see Duggee accessorising his tie and want to learn how to do it themselves. All of the Squirrels accessorise an item and showcase their goods.

programme.title: The Singing Badge
programme.desc: After a long walk the squirrels are starting to get tired, a song will help them get home.

programme.title: The Playing Badge
programme.desc: The squirrels are playing in the clubhouse when Naughty Monkey arrives and causes chaos!

programme.title: The Party Badge
programme.desc: Chipmunk has a parcel for Duggee, wrapped up like a present. Maybe its Duggees birthday!

programme.title: The Tour Guide Badge
programme.desc: Gerbie the snake is on holiday and would like to see all the sights. Duggee can help!

programme.title: The Sailing Badge
programme.desc: Duggee and the squirrels are enjoying a day at the beach, when they meet the Penguins.

programme.title: The Key Badge
programme.desc: Roly is digging in the garden when his spade suddenly hits something. Its a key.

programme.title: The Fashion Badge
programme.desc: Duggees uniform is a bit old and needs to be updated. Duggee can make his own clothes!!

programme.title: The Glasses Badge
programme.desc: When Mole was young he wanted to be a Stunt Mole! Can Duggee and the squirrels help?

programme.title: The Tooth Brushing Badge
programme.desc: Duggee and the Squirrels meet a lion with unfortunate breath.

programme.title: The Duck Badge
programme.desc: The clubhouse is inundated with stray ducklings who think Norrie is their mum.

programme.title: The Day Off Badge
programme.desc: Its Duggees day off but the Squirrels show up to tell him about their adventures.

programme.title: The Camouflage Badge
programme.desc: The Squirrels meet a chameleon called Cosey and learn about blending into surroundings.

programme.title: The Get Indoors Badge
programme.desc: A weather warning from Duggees barometer leads the Squirrels to round up the creatures.

programme.title: The Being Quiet Badge
programme.desc: Duggee and the Squirrels go on an adventure to find a famously shy creature.

programme.title: The Pen Pal Badge
programme.desc: Duggee arranges for the Squirrels to write to some pen pals.

programme.title: The Big Day Out Badge
programme.desc: Duggee takes the Squirrels and their parents on an exciting mystery trip.

programme.title: The Tree Badge
programme.desc: Duggee helps the Squirrels learn about all the things trees do for creatures around them.

programme.title: The Cheese Badge
programme.desc: Duggee and the Squirrels go on a mission to contain an outbreak.

programme.title: The Radio Badge
programme.desc: The Squirrels decide to start their own radio show.

programme.title: The Opposites Badge
programme.desc: The Squirrels have fun learning what opposites are, with help from their animal friends!

programme.title: The Breakfast Badge
programme.desc: Tags feeling grumpy because he didnt eat his breakfast, uh-oh!

programme.title: The Family Photo Badge
programme.desc: The Squirrels learn that friends can be like an extended family.

programme.title: The Future Badge
programme.desc: The Squirrels are transported into the future where they encounter a robot Duggee!

programme.title: The Philosophy Badge
programme.desc: The Squirrels think about lifes big questions, and gain their Philosophy badges.

programme.desc: Duggee and the Squirrels bake a pie and learn how to share by dividing things between them

programme.title: The History Badge

programme.title: The Art Badge
programme.desc: The Squirrels learn about different types of art and what inspires it.

programme.title: The Crazy Golf Badge

programme.title: The Mystery Badge
programme.desc: The squirrels have to solve the mystery of the missing red ruby.

programme.title: Bubble
programme.desc: Dee encourages a friend to say bubble and we go on a whirlwind word adventure! We see lots of different bubbles - big bubbles, tiny bubbles, shiny bubbles and even bouncing bubbles!

programme.desc: Plom, Phoebe, Mae-Mae, Hooper, Zip, and Fly are a group of unique paper friends who live in Pop Paper City. They find new ways to have fun, such as playing pirates, building theme parks and even exploring outer space.

programme.title: Tastebuddies
programme.desc: Messy, a monster, explores science questions that children ask about the world around us. Someone pass Messy the tissues! He discovers that things just dont taste the same when he has a cold, especially his favourite chewy green socks - lets find out why.

programme.title: Promises
programme.desc: Bluey keeps breaking her promises! But after seeing how much Bingo trusts Mums word, Bluey learns the power of promises and why its important not to break them.

programme.title: Omelette
programme.desc: Bingo is helping Mum make an omelette for Dads birthday breakfast, but cracking eggs is harder than it looks, and Dad is getting hungrier by the minute.

programme.desc: The team dives into action as Glitchs treasure hunt endangers the Great Barrier Reef.

programme.desc: While Mum and Dad struggle to build new flat-pack furniture, Bluey and Bingo transform the empty boxes into their own new world.

programme.desc: Andy heads out on an Arctic adventure to find out where walrus mothers nurse their pups.

programme.desc: JoJo and Gran Gran go on a day-trip to the seaside to build a big sandcastle for Panda. But JoJo learns that things need not last forever to be special!

programme.desc: Chilli and Bandit transform the old nursery into a new bedroom for Bluey. In the process, Bluey and Bingo amicably divide their belongings, but get absorbed by trading items and swapping notes at bedtime. Ultimately, when Bluey misses her sister, she asks to return to her old room.

programme.title: Footprints
programme.desc: Tinky Winky, Dipsy and LaaLaa follow a trail of muddy footprints and find Po in bed with very muddy feet. The Noo-Noo cleans off the mud.

programme.title: Bubble
programme.desc: Dee encourages a friend to say bubble and we go on a whirlwind word adventure! We see lots of different bubbles - big bubbles, tiny bubbles, shiny bubbles and even bouncing bubbles!

programme.title: The Friendship Parade
programme.desc: Plom, Phoebe, Mae-Mae, Hooper, Zip, and Fly are a group of unique paper friends who live in Pop Paper City. They find new ways to have fun, such as playing pirates, building theme parks and even exploring outer space.

programme.title: Tastebuddies
programme.desc: Messy, a monster, explores science questions that children ask about the world around us. Someone pass Messy the tissues! He discovers that things just dont taste the same when he has a cold, especially his favourite chewy green socks - lets find out why.

programme.desc: The team dives into action as Glitchs treasure hunt endangers the Great Barrier Reef.

programme.title: Flatpack
programme.desc: While Mum and Dad struggle to build new flat-pack furniture, Bluey and Bingo transform the empty boxes into their own new world.

programme.title: Queens
programme.desc: During a game of Queens, Bluey and Bingo find that playing the butler is much more fun. But someone must play the queen, even if it means not being afraid of a bit of hard work.

programme.title: Andy and the Walrus Pups
programme.desc: Andy heads out on an Arctic adventure to find out where walrus mothers nurse their pups.

programme.title: Lavender
programme.desc: Ranger Hamza and the Ramblers go on an eco quest to find out all about lavender.

programme.title: Head Scarf Calamity
programme.desc: Captain Captain decides to check that Sandy and Seaweeds pirate uniforms are clean, tidy and in perfect order. She is disappointed to discover that Seaweeds headscarf isnt up to scratch.

programme.title: The History Badge

programme.title: Panicky Percy
programme.desc: Percy causes confusion for everyone and prompts delays, when he spends too much time panicking over nothing.

programme.title: Mars As Moon

programme.title: Arcade Dance Off
programme.desc: Stumbling across an arcade, Sarah takes on a dancing challenge with John, whilst Duck and Flamingo team up to try and defeat a video game!

programme.title: Sand Monsters

programme.title: Dog Loves Warm

programme.title: Best Bike in the World

programme.title: Its time to build a sandcastle
programme.desc: JoJo and Gran Gran go on a day-trip to the seaside to build a big sandcastle for Panda. But JoJo learns that things need not last forever to be special!

programme.desc: On a very foggy day, The Golden Gate Bridges foghorns are missing. Can the Go Jetters help?

programme.title: Giants Causeway, Northern Ireland
programme.desc: A Giant Grandmaster Glitch means BIG trouble for the Giants Causeway!

programme.title: Mist Over Dream Lake
programme.desc: A young girl Chen is sent away by her parents who are going through divorce, to stay with the Changs. On the Changs farm, she meets their two sons, the youngest daughter and a young artist, and spends a summer with them that she will never forget.

programme.title: Cat VS Rat
programme.desc: Zhan and Bai are equally matched in martial arts skills. Bai saves the Emperor one day but did not believe in his identity and rejects a promotion. When Zhan is promoted to the royal guard after saving the Emperor, Bai gets angry and tries to prank him by stealing the imperial jade seal. Luckily, Zhan is able to retrieve the seal with his skills.

programme.title: Dead End
programme.desc: Uninhibited youth Chun meets a rich girl Wen when her car breaks down and drives her home. Chun falls in love with Wen but Wens brother dislikes him and forbids his sister to see him. He humiliates Chun and gets Chun beaten up, so Chun takes the pistol he has found accidentally on the street to Wens home and shoots her brother dead.

programme.title: The Brave Archer 2
programme.desc: Knowing Guo Jing has won Huang Rongs hand in marriage using the kung fu learned from Jiu Yin manual, Ouyang Feng captures Huang and agrees to release her only if Guo can dictate the content of the manual. Will Guo give in to the threat?

programme.title: Mr Funny - bone
programme.desc: Join Mr Funny bone in a series of comic vignettes as he attempts to win the heart of a dashing lady. Along for the ride is his loyal sidekick Mr Big Potato, a stout fellow who is forever getting into silly mishaps. The pair gets involved in plenty of shenanigans and gags!

programme.title: Four Riders
programme.desc: Four martial arts experts live in Seoul after the Korean War in the 1950s. One of them inexplicably crosses path with a drug trafficking syndicate, and his three friends have no choice but to fight a brutal battle on his side...

programme.title: Moonlight Serenade
programme.desc: A sweet inn-keepers daughter is witness to a perverted rape, leading to more danger than most romantic dramas can handle. Can her true love rescue her in time? For this movie, the moonlight serenade is the sound of suspense, leading to more danger than most romantic dramas can handle.

programme.title: The Black Enforcer
programme.desc: Lung the Black Enforcer is ordered to escort a murderer Fei to prison. While taking shelter in Lungs house from the snowstorm, Fei is rescued by his gang and Fei kills Lungs mother and sister before escaping. Lung is imprisoned for the failed task and after being released, he vows to avenge his family by killing Fei.

programme.title: Rear Entrance
programme.desc: Mrs Xu is childless and watches a lonely little girl playing at the rear entrance from afar every day. She warmly nurtures the girl and even adopts her from her uncaring parent. The girl brings happiness to the Xus until her long lost mother appears one day and to make her happy, Mrs Xu reluctantly lets the girl reunite with her mother.

programme.title: The Pirate
programme.desc: Pirate Chang Pao Chai discovers a leak in his ship after a successful raid on a foreign merchant ship. He goes ashore to get materials to patch up his ship, but encounters corrupt Qing officials oppressing the poor peasants. A good man at heart, he decides to help the peasants and gain a reputation of being a great pirate in the process.

programme.title: Facets Of Love
programme.desc: Set in the Ming Dynasty, the story revolves around a brothel and the girls who work there. The film begins by following the life of a girl from a poor family, who is sold by her mother to the brothel. While she is the most beautiful of the girls and attracts many clients, the girl hopes to escape this sad way of life one day.

programme.title: The Spiritual Boxer
programme.desc: One of the first kung fu comedies, this is a story about a con artist who uses kung fu to swindle villagers for money by pretending to be possessed by spirits. When they are threatened by bandits, he must use the same skills for good.

programme.title: Brothers from the Walled City
programme.desc: Two orphaned brothers growing up in Kowloons Walled City - the place where people are forced to live with indecent businesses of sex, gambling and drugs controlled by triads - take very different life paths. Chin works at a cabaret but keeps away from sins, while Kang is drawn to the sleazy underworld. Are their destinies shaped by the "walls"?

programme.title: Return of the Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: This sequel makes for more bittersweet laughs and heart-wrenching misfortune, as Ah Niu gets out of the jail to find his true love becoming the wife of an abusive husband, and his uncle further exploits his naive nature.

programme.title: Martial Arts of Shaolin
programme.desc: Zhi Ming, who trains at the Northern Shaolin Temple, teams up with Si Ma Yan, who trains at the Southern Shaolin Temple, to avenge both their fathers death by assassinating a corrupt magistrate, leading to a series of fierce battles!

programme.title: The Twin Bracelets
programme.desc: Two teenage girls make a pledge to look after each other in a small Chinese fishing town, where the notions of womens rights or sexual freedom are absent. One ends up happily married to a stranger, while the other is cruelly betrothed to the abusive son of a wealthy family and has to seek to free herself from the situation.

programme.title: Shaolin Intruders
programme.desc: On a routine courier mission, the prestigious Chief was murdered by four mysterious monks. When all evidence pointed to Ching Hua, his friend Lei decides to clear his name by barging in the Shaolin Temple thrice. When Lei thought justice was served for the culprits, he soon realizes the table had turned and the monks stroke again. What follows is a series of intense pursuit for the ultimate villain!

programme.title: The Comedy of Mismatches
programme.desc: Two pairs of lovers got mismatched accidentally. The man disguises as a woman for his sisters wedding ceremony, while his lover disguises as a man to marry another woman. After the marriage mismatches are revealed, the lovers and their families are taken to court, where Prefecture Chief Qiao manages to work out a happy ending.

programme.title: Heaven and Hell
programme.desc: When an angel, Ling, decides to help his two friends who have fallen in love to escape from Heaven, he is sent to live as a human on earth as his punishment. Reincarnated as a cab driver, he sacrifices his own life to save another ill-fated couple and lands in hell, where he has to face off against the ghosts and demons to fight his way out!

programme.title: Disco Bumpkins
programme.desc: This musical comedy is about how a young man Fen, along with his buddy Hamburger, finds love and success in the advertising world.

programme.title: Clan Of The White Lotus
programme.desc: The head of White Lotus Clan, Lo, is a highly skilled martial artist who supports the Qing government and helps destroy the rebellion group. Hung from Shaolin who kills Los brother, is being hunted and hides in another rebel Hus house. The clan attacks at night killing Hu and his sister, but Hung manages to get Hus pregnant wife to safety.

programme.title: The Lark
programme.desc: Sixties pop star Carrie Ku plays the "Little Lark" in this romantic-drama of mistaken identity that is a treasure trove of some of the most popular Mandarin songs of all time.

programme.title: The Sword of Swords
programme.desc: The Sword Master passes on his sword to his disciple Lin before he dies. Another disciple Fang also eyes the sword and plots to take it away from Lin, destroying his family and blinding him in the process. Lin finally battles Fang for revenge and vows to reclaim his sword.

programme.title: Black Magic
programme.desc: Hsu Lo is up against an evil black magic practitioner San Kan Mi, who wants to place a death spell on him and a love spell on his fiancee Wang Chu Ying. Fortunately, Wangs friends manage to find another veteran witch doctor to take on the evil San. This bone-chilling tale of good versus evil races to a heart-stopping ending.

programme.title: Killers On Wheels
programme.desc: Kuo takes his family to an outlying island of Hong Kong for a vacation. On the ferry, they meet a group of young hooligans cum motorcyclists called the "speed gang

programme.title: The Devils Mirror
programme.desc: A power-hungry Witch who leads the Bloody Ghouls Clan, seeks two magical mirrors, Wind Mirror and Thunder Mirror, which are owned by Bai and the Wen Clan respectively. She needs both mirrors to find the location of a powerful weapon that will make her invincible and will stop at nothing to get her hands on them.

programme.title: Invincible Shaolin
programme.desc: An evil Qing general comes up with a plan to rid the Shaolin masters once and for all. He invites three Northern Shaolin experts to fight against three Southern Shaolin disciples. After the contest, the general secretly kills the Southerners and places the blame on the Northerners. This leads to in-fighting between both Shaolin schools.

programme.title: Duel For Gold
programme.desc: Six swordsmen, including two sisters and their husbands, a ranger and a security man, are trying to steal a million gold taels from the Fu Lai Treasury House, not knowing that one of them is actually an undercover hero. In their quest, they have to double-cross and outwit one another...

programme.title: The Grand Substitution
programme.desc: In this Opera epic, a loyal Imperial Court servant gives up his own newborn son to save the prince from an evil official.

programme.title: Clans of Intrigue
programme.desc: Heroic outlaw Chu Liu Xiang is dining with his friend Monk Wu Hua, when Gong from the Holy Water Palace appears and accuses Chu of stealing the holy water from her Palace and using it for various murders. Chu denies, and is given a month to find the murderer or be killed by Gong. To prove his innocence, Chu decides to investigate the case...

programme.title: The Scandalous Warlord
programme.desc: General Feng occupies the city of Shandong, and soldiers and civilians alike welcome him without knowing his tyrannical and lustful nature. His first official business is to inspect the brothels and take the prostitutes home to become his concubines. Feng is finally killed by his officers, but will the new general rule the city differently?

programme.title: Little Hero
programme.desc: An orphan, Little Bastard is taken on and trained as a fighter by a hermit. When Little Bastard grows up, he feels he is old enough to go out and look for his parents. Luckily for him, he befriends a beggar, Hsiao Yi, who being street-wise, manages to help him find his family, but somehow gets into trouble with the gang.

programme.title: Crazy Shaolin Disciples
programme.desc: Three young kung-fu warriors from wildly different backgrounds become students of Shaolin at the same temple. These three warriors are: Royal Guard Lo Lieh, fleeing soldier, Lo Meng, and villager, Wang Yu.

programme.title: Monkey Kung Fu
programme.desc: Wei Chun is a cocky young man sentenced to jail for killing a man in a fight. One day, Wei Chun picks a fight with a seemingly defenseless old man who completely thrashes him! The old man turns out to be the master of monkey style kung fu and as they become friends, he gives Wei Chun half of a medallion that would direct him to hidden secrets.

programme.title: The Singing Escort
programme.desc: Betty Ting plays Susan, a young woman hiding from her father by being a nightclub singer in Japan. Pop singer Chao Ke-jen (Lin Chong) gets permission from his boss to visit Japan, with the condition that he finds the bosss daughter. Boy finds girl, boy falls in love. But will the father approve?

programme.title: Return of Reincarnated Swordsman
programme.desc: A band of ninjas slaughters the entire Wu Dang Clan and frames Du Gu Wu Di, chief of the Invincible Clan, for the deed. Yun masters the silkworm martial arts style and decides to take revenge for the Clan by challenging Wu Di, but is defeated and seriously hurt. Luckily, Master Li saves and treats him, allowing Yun to avoid the ninjas pursuit.

programme.title: The Fantastic Magic Baby
programme.desc: The story is about the legendary Monkey King (Liu Chung-chun) teams up with Goddess of Mercy (Chao Li-chuan) and the Dragon Girl (Lung Nu) to battle the child god Hung Hai-erh (Ting Hua-chung),son of the Ox Demon (Hung Hai-erh) to rescue Tang Tseng, the Holy Pilgrim (Teng Chio-jen).

programme.title: China News
programme.desc: China News focuses on the latest news and social changes happening in China as well as all over the world.

programme.title: Focus Today
programme.desc: Focus Today traces current affairs from China and the world.

programme.title: My Dream Girl
programme.desc: Tycoon Cheung is back in China after being abroad for five years and finds his long-lost daughter, Ling, in a poor village. To transform his unrefined and dirty daughter into a lady, Cheung hires Joe as Lings image consultant.

programme.title: Shark Busters
programme.desc: During the financial crisis, a vast majority of Hong Kong people experience difficulties in repaying debts. During this time, loan sharks use ruthless ways to force debtors to repay their loans and it is up to Officer Lee and his underground team to hunt down the head of this illegal organization.

programme.title: City of Desire
programme.desc: Sister 13 returns to Macau after 17 years to succeed her fathers underground empire, the prostitution business. She tries to stop their exploitation of the sex workers, but Macaus economy flourished after the handover, propelling the prostitution and gambling businesses. The city is blinded by desire and Sister 13 can do nothing to help...

programme.title: Sound of Colors
programme.desc: Lonesome marriage consultant Ming meets a blind but charming young lady, Yeuk, at a subway station. When Ming suddenly turns blind too, Yeuk helps him navigate through his world of darkness, and they begin to fall in love. This feature is based on the illustrated book from famous Taiwan illustrator Jimmy Liao.

programme.title: Dont Open Your Eyes
programme.desc: A cop has the ability to see ghosts, which is something that has been passed down from generation to generation in his family. He must learn how to manage this gift when he is confronted by the ghost of a notorious criminal whom he has shot.

programme.title: Model from Hell
programme.desc: Anna, an exceptional student in a modelling school, becomes the target of envy from fellow models, who all die mysteriously when they want to harm her. It turns out that when Anna is upset, she undergoes a terrifying transformation and can wield lethal psychic power...

programme.title: Love in a Fallen City
programme.desc: Based on a novel of the same name by the famous novelist Eileen Chang and directed by the equally acclaimed director Ann Hui, this romance story depicts the challenging relationship between an introverted Shanghai divorcee and a cynical Malaysian playboy during the Japanese invasion of Hong Kong in the 1940s. Will the lovers be together in the end?

programme.title: Girl with the Diamond Slipper
programme.desc: An aspiring TV actress gets into hot water when a stolen diamond is hidden in the shoes she bought for a party.

programme.title: Happy Family
programme.desc: Sang, the only son of a rich family, falls in love with Kaka. They plan to get married, but Sangs father stops him from marrying her because she is his half-sister. Later, Sang falls in love with another girl who turns out to be his half-sister too. With Sang devastated, his mother unveils yet another big secret...

programme.title: The Phantom Lover
programme.desc: In 1926 China, Sung, a talented singer, is deeply in love with To, a sweet innocent girl from a wealthy family. Their love evokes strong disapproval from Tos father and bitter jealousy from her designated fiance, a young man chosen by her family. This is a story about a singer and a wealthy girl battling to be together in a traditional community.

programme.title: The Myth
programme.desc: An archaeologist Jack, and a scientist William, stumble upon ancient Qin Dynasty artifacts that lead them to the mausoleum and mysteriously connects Jack to his past life as a warrior in ancient China, starting their mythical journey.

programme.title: Wo Hu
programme.desc: The Hong Kong Police has placed more than a thousand undercover officers in various triad groups to bring down the largest criminal organization in Hong Kong. Betrayal, deceit and murder bring this group of "brothers" into a collision with the law and with each other!

programme.title: Protege
programme.desc: Undercover Police Nick has spent 8 years working for the drug baron Quin, so as to collect evidence of his drug trafficking activities. After gaining Quins trust, Nick becomes his protege and succeeds him as the drug baron when Quin retires. However, Nick has lost himself in his split life between trading drugs and searching for criminal evidence.

programme.title: The Mad Monk
programme.desc: Stephen Chow plays an arrogant god in Heaven who is being punished for his pranks and mistakes. He is sent to Earth and reincarnate as Mad Monk to change the destiny of three misguided souls - a prostitute, a beggar and a villain. The Mad Monk needs to complete the task in three days in order to return to Heaven.

programme.title: Golden Chicken
programme.desc: Ah Kam, a seasoned prostitute, gets locked inside an ATM vestibule with a thief. Both discover they are ill-fated in life and Ah Kam starts telling him her life story as a prostitute, from a teenage hooker to a PR girl in an upscale club in her thirties, as well as being a strip dancer, bar girl and masseuse.

programme.title: Hero
programme.desc: Ma Wing Jing and his brother arrive in Shanghai to make their fortune. Befriending a powerful mobster Tam, Ma is given his nightclub when he saves Tams life. Mas fortune rises but he must overcome the corruption and violence to survive.

programme.title: The Gambling Ghost
programme.desc: Sammo Hung plays three roles: Fatty, Fattys father and grandfather. Hoping to become rich, hotel staff Fatty dives into gambling with his friend to the dismay of his father. When Fatty hits rock bottom, his grandfathers ghost appears to help him. As Fatty finds out that his grandfather was murdered, he vows to avenge his death.

programme.title: Long Arm of the Law Part 3
programme.desc: Chinese ex-soldier Li is wrongly accused and seeks refuge in Hong Kong to escape a death sentence. En route, he meets Sam and Moon. While Li has fallen in love with Moon, Hong Kong triad kidnaps Moon and coerces Li into aiding a robbery. Meanwhile, the mainland police officer tracks Lis path to Hong Kong, intensifying the chase.

programme.title: Chungking Express
programme.desc: Two Hong Kong urban love stories depicting two Hong Kong policemen, both jilted by ex-lovers and falling in love again. One falls for a mysterious female underworld figure while the other is in love with a beautiful and witty server at a fast food restaurant he frequents.

programme.title: Prince Charming
programme.desc: Chen Li Pin, the nerdy son of a business tycoon, and his friend seek love in Hawaii. Returning home in disappointment, they accidentally find themselves in a messy identity swap. It is at this time that Chen falls for a beautiful girl May, who thinks he is a company chauffeur...

programme.title: The Story of Woo Viet
programme.desc: Former Vietnamese veteran Woo Viet arrives a refugee camp in Hong Kong and meets his pen pal Quan. Subsequently, he encounters Shum Ching, with whom he attempts to flee to the US. However, the pair end up stranded in Manilas Chinatown, where at the hands of the local triads Woo becomes a hired killer, while Shum is forced into prostitution.

programme.title: Heart of Dragon
programme.desc: A cop, Tat, forsakes his dream of becoming a sailor to take care of his mentally disabled brother, Danny. When Danny steals from a gangster by accident and gets kidnapped, Tat must turn over a key police witness in order to save him. Left with no choice, Tat has to abduct the witness and fight the gangsters until he gets Danny back.

programme.title: Beauty And The 7 Beasts
programme.desc: Teddy, once a renowned movie star, is facing a career decline. To make a living, he accepts five disciples to shape them into stars. Teddys career regains momentum after he reunites with his long-lost daughter, but he is also confronted by a rival at the same time. His daughter and disciples decide to help him overcome this difficult situation...

programme.title: Feel 100% 2003
programme.desc: Based on the popular comic book of the same name, Jerry and Lok are two best buddies with a common goal of finding their perfect girlfriend. Neither of them has ever encountered anything close to their "100% girl

programme.title: Dragon Tiger Gate
programme.desc: Adapted from a famous Hong Kong comic, Tiger Wong is ambushed after he unwittingly took the Lousha Plaque but is saved by his brother Dragon Wong. They also befriended Turbo Shek during the fight and the trio forms a brotherhood. To avenge the death of the Dragon Gate masters, they train and vow to defeat Shibumi, the leader of Lousha Clan.

programme.title: Undercover Hidden Dragon
programme.desc: In this hilarious comedy, Fat is a gangster who suffers from amnesia. Believing that he is actually an undercover policeman, Fat attempts to arrest gang leader Big Bro, but instead becomes the gangsters best ally. To complicate matters further, a gangster named Wind, who looks exactly like Fat, starts a turf war with Big Bro.

programme.title: Winner Takes All
programme.desc: Swindler Master Wong has cheated Paulines father of his lifetime savings and Pauline vows to bring him to justice. On the way to find Wong, Pauline befriends a young conman and teams up with him to set up a perfect plot to scam Wong. Will their plan succeed and can she uphold justice in the end?

programme.title: Mother VS Mother
programme.desc: Guan De Xing fell in love with Li Xiao Yun when he was young, but was opposed by his mother and had to marry Zhou Shen Yu. Since then, Li holds a grudge against Zhou. Unfortunately, the son of Guan and Zhou falls in love with Lis daughter, and as the two mothers meet, they start brawling again!

programme.title: Behind the Yellow Line
programme.desc: A fresh graduate, Paul, strikes up an acquaintance with a pretty young girl, Monica, on the metro. Monica is involved in a love affair with a married man while Paul is also pursued by a rich girl. When Paul vows his true love for Monica, she suggests playing hide-and-seek with him in the metro to decide if they are fated to be together.

programme.title: The Sparrow
programme.desc: Kei is an experienced "Sparrow

programme.title: The Eye 2
programme.desc: Joey looks to start a new life after a failed suicide attempt but finds herself pregnant and dare not tell her ex-boyfriend. At the same time, she realizes that a mysterious woman is stalking her and begins to hallucinate, leading to a nervous breakdown. Taking advice from an abbot, Joey decides to uncover the truth in order to protect her baby...

programme.title: Kung Fu Mahjong 3
programme.desc: Gambling tycoon Man suddenly marries his new partner Sophie, which shocked his only son, Ken. In the wake of Mans heart attack, Ken must battle Sophie - who has persuaded Man to transfer his grand master title to her in the event of his death - for the rightful claim to the familys gambling business in a riveting game of mahjong.

programme.title: Seven Swords
programme.desc: Seven warriors of exceptional swordsmanship band together to protect a village from an evil general in this exciting martial arts film.

programme.title: My Wife is 18
programme.desc: Cheung, a dull thirty-year-old man, gets married in the UK to lovely YoYo, who is just eighteen, so as to fulfil their parents wishes. Back in Hong Kong, their relationship is that of an assumed couple, as well as a teacher and student. With contradictions and funny incidents governing their relationship, the two gradually fall in love...

programme.title: The Medallion
programme.desc: Hong Kong cop Eddie is hired by the Interpol to capture a human smuggling gang leader known as Snakehead. Eddie dies in an action to protect a sacred child from being kidnapped, but is brought back to life by the childs magical medallion, allowing him to finally kill Snakehead.

programme.title: July Rhapsody
programme.desc: A 40-year-old high school teacher is in midlife crisis. His marriage is on the rocks and he is involved in a taboo romance with a female student who has a crush on him. Meanwhile, his wife is off to care for her dying ex-lover who shares a complicated history with the couple...

programme.title: Fallen Angels
programme.desc: The funkier cousin to Chungking Express, director Wong Kar Wai looks at five fallen angels who suffer love and loss amidst the crime and chaos of Hong Kongs neon nights in this movie. Karen Mok won Best Supporting Actress in the 15th Hong Kong Film Awards for her remarkable role as a broken-hearted party girl.

programme.title: Mahjong Heroes
programme.desc: A hero helps a young student deflect a cunning and malicious gambling tycoon who is out to take over the students family business over a game of mahjong.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the worlds top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and "accepted wisdom" to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, the Agenda quite simply sets the agenda. You wont find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of todays world.

programme.title: Big Story
programme.desc: Big Story is a documentary film program on CGTN. It explores global events with in a variety of filmic styles and featuring original, in-depth, thought-provoking storytelling. The program provides a unique platform for the best current affairs documentaries from around the globe. Big Story aims to present the contemporary world and Chinas global perspectives on the contemporary world to an international audience.

programme.title: Killed My Mother Or Innocent Driver?
programme.desc: A tragic car crash leads to the death of an 89-year-old woman. Her daughter, who was behind the wheel, is blamed for her death and faces a life behind bars. Carless driver or devastated crash survivor?

programme.title: Beyond The Headlines: The Gabby Petito Story
programme.desc: This special details the ups and downs of the tragic road trip through the lens of Gabbys social media presence. Told by the people who knew her best and a community of online strangers and cyber sleuths.

programme.title: Leon Jacob
programme.desc: Leon Jacob is currently serving a life sentence. He was found guilty of plotting, along with his girlfriend, Valerie McDaniel, the murder of his ex-girlfriend and Valeries ex-husband.

programme.title: Lured
programme.desc: Several survivors detail the story of Jeffrey Epstein, the mysterious billionaire who lured them to his home through an elaborate series of female recruiters they thought they could trust.

programme.title: Cruel Intentions
programme.desc: A woman in a volatile relationship is found dead in her car. Detectives suspect her boyfriend, but, at trial, he takes the stand to brazenly claim she was actually the victim of a drug deal gone bad.

programme.title: After The 60 Days: Part One
programme.desc: After the remaining participant leaves the program, the sheriff and her staff process how to implement the feedback as the inmates continue serving their time.

programme.title: Shawna Forde
programme.desc: Shawna Forde was convicted for a 2009 crime that resulted in the violent murders of Raul Flores and his 9-year-old daughter Brisenia. She was sentenced to death.

A look at some of the wildest courtroom moments: a violent felon attacks a prosecutor in court; a judge has heard enough from a Sovereign Citizen; a murdered NBA stars mother blows up in court; and more.
A look at some of the wildest courtroom moments: a judge sets a mom straight on her murderer son; a defense attorney is held in contempt; a convicted felon faces the cop he shot in court; and more.

programme.title: A Wave From The Grave And More
programme.desc: A murderous spirit toys with a man trapped in a claustrophobia-inducing closet. A shadow figure makes itself at home at a house in Chile. Plus, much more paranormal footage you have to see to believe.

programme.title: Killed My Mother Or Innocent Driver?
programme.desc: A tragic car crash leads to the death of an 89-year-old woman. Her daughter, who was behind the wheel, is blamed for her death and faces a life behind bars. Carless driver or devastated crash survivor?

programme.title: Justice For April
programme.desc: Small-town detectives are frightened by what may come next after a young girl is brutally murdered in the woods; with a chance encounter and a digital trail, they must catch the child murderer at large.

programme.title: Kids Who Kill - Kim Edwards and Lucas Markham
programme.desc: Kim Edwards and Lucas Markham were both outsiders from troubled homes. They felt they understood each other when no one else did. Together they made a plan to get rid of the mum and sister Kim resented.

programme.title: Part Four
programme.desc: The tire track found at the Donna Bennett Johnston crime scene provided police with a long list of potential suspects, everyone in the Baton Rouge area who had purchased an Aquatred tire.

programme.title: Court Cam: Top 10 Moments Of 2021
programme.desc: A countdown of the top 10 moments of 2021 on Court Cam.

programme.title: The Pickup Truck Killer
programme.desc: Chamlong Nirut Sornkamharn worked the highways of Thailand, hiring men as truck drivers, poisoning them to death and stealing their cars. Was he working for car traffickers or a serial killer?

programme.title: JaRay Wilson
programme.desc: JaRay Wilson texted her mother just minutes before she vanished. For over a year, the teens friends, family, and community searched for answers.

programme.title: Beyond the Headlines: The Tanya Kach Story With Elizabeth Smart

programme.title: Fast Food Lemur Nation
programme.desc: Tired of waiting so long for his meals, King Julien introduces "fast food" to the kingdom, but the side effects are not what he expected.

programme.title: Get Off My Lawn
programme.desc: When King Julien thinks hes a crime victim, he buys the village self-defense scorpions from a shady dealer, leaving everyone armed and dangerous.

programme.title: Potty Mouth
programme.desc: After a baby says a swear word on live television (censored by child-friendly online filter Sheriff Potty Pardner), Boss becomes obsessed with proving that the baby was taught this filth by their new arch-nemesis, Lumpy the Park Duck. Meanwhile, Tinas search to find what that swear word means creates unintentional havoc for both Tabithas research paper and for Baby Corps online systems when Sheriff Potty Pardner gives them an "internet time out"

programme.title: Imaginary Friends
programme.desc: After Boss insults Tinas imaginary friend, hes forced into "Imaginary Friend Sensitivity Training" at Baby Corp. Boss makes up his own imaginary friend to get out of these meetings, but after Tina gets a whiff that he may be lying, hes forced to keep up the charade at work and at home.

programme.title: Captain Underpants and the Shadowy Syndrome of the Sinister Splotch
programme.desc: Captain Underpants becomes a wanted man in underwear when footage surfaces of a robber who looks exactly like him. George and Harold, positive its an impostor, try to track down the perp and bring him to justice. But can the boys do this before Captain Underpants is found guilty?

programme.title: Captain Underpants and the Bizarre Blitzkrieg of the Bothersome Butt-erflies
programme.desc: As a prank, George and Harold use Melvins new animal hybrid invention to create a creature thats a cross between a butt and a fly. But some of the monster butt-erflies want to eat everything in sight- including the students hiding out in the school gym!

programme.title: The Pangea-ing
programme.desc: There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponents-her mom.

programme.title: The Poison Ravine
programme.desc: There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponents-her mom.

programme.title: Bees
programme.desc: Puss is terrified by an invasion by a swarm of bees, which only the hippy-like "Piper" can control with her magic flute.

programme.title: Squad
programme.desc: Just as Puss is training the orphans to protect San Lorenzo, El Moco storms into town and cat-naps the swashbuckling hero.

programme.title: FOMO-OPUP / Lost in the Woods
programme.desc: Poppy and Archer get lost in Troll Forest together during one of his escape attempts and must learn to trust each other/Obsessed with finding Nova Swifts next pop-up party, Guy Diamond enlists the Snack Pack to help him on the hunt

programme.title: Party Crashed
programme.desc: When the Party Crashers invade Troll Village, they trap Poppy and Branch, party throughout the village, and challenge the Trolls to a dramatic sing-off

programme.title: Racetrack
programme.desc: Ton-Tons friends, The Dumps, visit the Flatirons but are too wild and crazy for the crew, so the Dinotrux build a racetrack perfect for joyriding.

programme.title: Gluphosaurus
programme.desc: When D-Structs tricks the Gluphosaurs into attacking the Dinotrux, Revvit must befriend them and find a way to "unstick" the crew from one another.

programme.title: Captain Underpants and the Trashy Tale of the Tumultuous Tubbadump
programme.desc: In honor of Dump Day in Piqua- celebrating the creation of the dump - George and Harold try to earn extra credit by creating a trash-alanche. But Melvin creates an invention to suck all the trash into another dimension. The plan backfires when Tubbadump, a trash-covered monster, emerges from that dimension for revenge on the trashmakers.

programme.title: Captain Underpants and the Taxing Trauma of the Treacherous Tattle Trials Part I
programme.desc: In part one of a two-part season finale, the Melvins create a final exam that George and Harold will be sure to fail: the Doom Dome. To ensure success, Melvinborg injects Melvins cells with nanobots, giving him heightened powers. But when George and Harold find out, they crank the nanobots to the max, causing Melvin to grow into a giant! The boys enlist Captain Underpants to fight the jealous nerd, but their victory only loses the nanobots onto Piqua...

programme.title: Talent Show / Sad Sad Plant
programme.desc: Kelp writes a song about him and Scallop to perform at the unicorn show. But when it comes time, Scallop wants to keep the song "just for them

programme.title: Chore Score / Dew Drop Swap
programme.desc: On Harpers first allowance day, the pets accidentally knock Harpers Piggy Bank over and lose one of her quarters that she was reserving to buy Nicholas an ice cream cone. Now the Dew Drops must scramble to replace it! / When the Dew Drops struggle to help their kids with tasks that are outside their usual fairy-bilities, they decide to swap kids for the day, but ultimately learn they re exactly where they need to be because they know their families so well!

programme.title: Inside Jokings / Its A Jungle In There
programme.desc: Tip and Oh make their first inside joke and Oh shares it with everyone; Tip watches Ohs new alien plant while hes gone and breeds a catastrophe.

programme.title: Dang You Saved My Life / Boovsland Noir
programme.desc: Sharzod hates feeling indebted to Tip after being rescued and tries to get "even"; Police King Kyle must solve the case of Sharzods missing mojo.

programme.title: Lucky and the Escape Artist
programme.desc: Soon-to-be-big sister Lucky "borrows" Snips for a day to see what its like to have a little sibling, but nothing goes as planned

programme.title: Lucky and the Thin Ice
programme.desc: The frontier gets a chill when Lucky, Spirit and the PALs attempt to rescue a missing girl

programme.title: Lucky and the Ray of Sunshine
programme.desc: The PALs agree to work on Graysons ranch to get out of trouble, but he gets more help than he bargained for

programme.title: Imaginary Friends
programme.desc: After Boss insults Tinas imaginary friend, hes forced into "Imaginary Friend Sensitivity Training" at Baby Corp. Boss makes up his own imaginary friend to get out of these meetings, but after Tina gets a whiff that he may be lying, hes forced to keep up the charade at work and at home.

programme.title: Turf War
programme.desc: Its a turf war when Bounce House Bruiser Baby encroaches on Delivery Babys tricycle park! Tina attempts to befriend Bruiser in order to woo her back to the bounce house, but naughty behavior is the only language Bruiser understands. Determined to win this kid over, Tina ends up going rogue as a trike hoodlum, and her own field team is forced to reign her in.

programme.title: Trading Up
programme.desc: Boss takes an overdue vacation day, and ends up teaching Tabitha the value of "trading up" valueless objects into something she actually wants, an electric scooter. However, a 5%er baby is in trouble and BBs field team has "got it under control" or do they? Boss tries to juggle his Tabitha lessons with sneaking peeks at the mission in progress

programme.title: One Last Jobs
programme.desc: When Pajunas former partner, Roz, returns to San Lorenzo asking for help with ongoing jobs, Pajuna leaves the Cantina causing Puss to have a potential breakdown

programme.title: Ruff Transition
programme.desc: A baby Razorwhip bonds with Ruffnut forcing her to become a Wingmaiden but when she doesnt have the maternal instincts she must figure out how to protect the baby dragon when the Flyers attack

programme.title: Scared Crazy / Superslushious
programme.desc: Tip and Oh go camping but soon learn about a crazy Boov who scares everyone; Oh upgrades Slushious to "Superslushious" things get out of hand.

programme.title: There Will Be Juice
programme.desc: When a crate of PURE ORGANIC IMPOSSIBLY SAFE ORGANIC NUTRIENTS washes onto shore King Julien accidentally overfeeds the crops creating a giant mango that tries to take over the world

programme.title: Lucky and the Double-Dad Dare
programme.desc: Jim and Al set up a survival course for Lucky, Pru and Abigail, but when things go awry, the dads are the ones who need saving

programme.title: Dial M For Mystery/Turbo Real
programme.desc: Somebody knocks Whiplash unconscious for real at a fake mystery dinner; the crew competes for attention on a reality show, leading to complete chaos.

programme.title: Omega Shield
programme.desc: The Voltron Coalition begins a massive liberation campaign while Lotor insists on building a ship capable of entering the Quintessence Field

programme.title: Inside Hobson/Annie Oakley
programme.desc: When Hobsons invention goes haywire, he shrinks - and swallows - Sherman so Peabody must travel through Hobsons body to save him while hosting show

programme.title: Bumbles Special Lunch
programme.desc: Fifi has invited the other tots over to lunch but she is not very well. Bumble gamely steps in and offers to cook for her. What could possibly go wrong?

programme.title: Fifi Misses Me Not
programme.desc: Bumble has gone off on a pollen collecting expedition. He wishes Fifi was with him. Meanwhile, back in the garden, Fifi is missing her best friend too.

programme.title: The Case Of The Sticker Mystery
programme.desc: New stickers, with a picture of a mysterious bandit, have appeared in Toyland. Clockwork Mouse begs Noddy to investigate. He finds himself going head to head with jealous Hoof who wants to prove that Noddy isnt the only investigator in Toyland. Hoof thinks hes solved the case in no time, but Noddys attention to detail makes him realise the bandit isnt quite what he seems.

programme.title: The Case Of The Stolen Treasure
programme.desc: The pirates are having a spring clean of their galleon, much to the annoyance of Pirate Stripes who wants to go on a treasure hunt. Later that day, the pirate treasure disappears! Oh no! Noddy needs to investigate at once. A strange new galleon appears on the horizon. Could it be Tina the Terrible? Has she stolen the treasure? Using all his detecting skills Noddy follows the clues to the DareDale Caves where he realises that the ship on the horizon isnt Tina the Terribles galleon at all.

programme.title: Why Aardvark Has A Sticky Tongue
programme.desc: You see there was a time when Aardvark didnt have a sticky tongue. He had a long nose, big clumsy paws and he found it very difficult to eat. Then one day Aardvarks tongue got stuck in the honey log! All his friends pulled and pulled until KERPLING! Aardvarks tongue finally came unstuck. From that day on Aardvarks tongue was all long and sticky - perfect for eating yummy termites. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Why Whale Spouts
programme.desc: You see there was a time when Whale didnt spout. Then one day there is a big storm in Tinga Tinga. The winds blew stronger and the ocean waves got bigger and bigger. Suddenly an enormous wave picks up Whale and carries her all the way from the ocean to the Waterhole. SPLOSH! But Whale was so full of water that she couldnt move! How do the animals help Whale get back to the ocean? For once, Elephant has the answer. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Silver Hatch Shapes Up
programme.desc: Conrod is having an engine tune up at Silver Hatch. He boasts that his spoilers make him faster than all the other cars who then want to be just as fast as their V8 hero

programme.title: Pit Stop Perils
programme.desc: Mr Carburettor is fed up with Roary and Maxi constantly bickering about who is the fastest car at Silver Hatch. He decrees that the pair will have a race, and whoever wins, is the fastest - no more arguing!

programme.title: Iced Out
programme.desc: Frustrated that shes not fitting in with the team, Aggro goes off on her own with Elbone on a mission to save a dragon egg trapped in ice.

programme.title: Bridge to Meowbuquerque / No Part Harmony
programme.desc: Today is Yarn Ball Day, a special day in the cat-filled town of Meowbuquerque. Unfortunately, the bridge leading to the party is broken. With time ticking, Tag, Scooch, and Kit work together at getting the cats across to the party. / When The Barkapellas announce that theyre cancelling their biggest concert ever, Tag is determined to figure out why in order to get them back on stage. But with a stadium full of impatient fans, Tag is going to have to work fast.

programme.title: Tip And Oh: Home For The Holidays
programme.desc: Oh takes it upon himself to introduce Christmas joy to his fellow Boovs. Unfortunately, his well-meaning mission nearly destroys the city.

programme.title: Spirit Of Christmas
programme.desc: Lucky and friends must figure out how to get home in time for Christmas when a falling boulder -- and a serious snowstorm -- derail their travel plans.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Christmas Bonus
programme.desc: _x000D_ _x000D_When Boss Baby accidentally gets mistaken for an elf and sent to the North Pole on Christmas Eve, he mobilizes unpaid elf workers against an old nemesis: that charity-loving hippie people call Santa Claus. Meanwhile, Tim races to the North Pole to get his baby brother back home in time for Templeton Family Christmas traditions.

programme.title: Captain Underpants and the Xtreme Xploits of the Xplosive Xmas Special
programme.desc: George and Harold love Christmas, but they feel like it could use some upgrades. So they make a comic about a new version of the holiday: BLISSMAS. Instead of red bows, laser shows! Instead of ugly sweaters, cool capes! Instead of decorating trees, creating tree-bots! The boys take Melvins time toad back to convince Santa to incorporate some of their ideas to his new holiday. But they come back to the present to find that their plan didnt work quite how theyd hoped.

programme.title: Razors Edge
programme.desc: Keith and Krolia cross a new space universe in search of a powerful source of Quintessence

programme.title: Peabodys Diet/Ponce De Leon
programme.desc: During a food-themed show, Peabody realizes he is out of shape but still just cant stop eating so its up to Sherman to help him lose weight

programme.title: Pirate Primrose
programme.desc: The tots are playing at pirates, all except Primrose, who is being a princess, naturally. But guess which tot has the best pirating skills when they are needed

programme.title: Primrose Loses It
programme.desc: Primrose has broken her new necklace and lost the beads. She is unconsolable. Violet holds a make and do party to replace the necklace

programme.title: The Case Of The Moving Train Tracks
programme.desc: Queen Sparklewings is having a fairy picnic in Fable Forest that evening. Everyone offers to help set up for the picnic but Queen Sparklewings tells them not to worry - the fairies can do it all. Later, when Noddy and all his friends are approaching Fable Forest Station on the train they discover someone has redirected the train tracks. They cant get to Fable Forest. How will they have the picnic in time? Noddy needs to investigate why the train tracks have been moved.

programme.title: The Case Of The King Of Toyland
programme.desc: Noddy returns from a Make and Take party at Pat-Pats and finds the Builders are constructing a big orange palace in Toy Green. by order of the King of Toyland! Noddy decides to investigate: who is the mysterious King of Toyland? He spots the Knights carrying a royal litter, but all he can see inside is the top of an orange crown. Realising the Kings favourite colour must be orange, Noddy remembers seeing Pat-Pat painting a bowl of oranges and wonders if she knows who the King is.

programme.title: Why Parrot Cant Keep A Secret
programme.desc: You see there was a time when Parrot was the best keeper of secrets in the whole of Tinga Tinga. Infact Parrot couldnt open his beak at all! Then one day some beast dares to steal Lions mane and Parrot sees the whole thing! But how is going to tell Lion?! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Why Bushbaby Has Big Eyes
programme.desc: You see there was a time when Bushbaby didnt have big eyes. She had tiny little eyes and she was always getting lost. Strange things begin to happen and there are stories that Majitu the Great Giant has returned to Tinga Tinga. Young Bushbaby doesnt believe a word of it... and convinces the other animals that Majitu the Giant does not exist. "If you cant see him, hes not real". But then she does see the Giant and her eyes grow big as planets. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Roarys Demolition Derby
programme.desc: Roary is in a mischievous mood and keeps crashing into things. Big Chris has a great idea how Roary can burn up all his energy and be helpful at the same time!

programme.title: Manners Please
programme.desc: Farmer Green and FB are very nervous about going to Mama Mias garden party. James and the other cars offer to teach them how to behave at such an event. But everything doesnt quite go to plan

programme.title: Home Alone
programme.desc: Aggro, Burple and Cutter are left alone in the roost to care for some dragon eggs, but a trio of tricky Slinkwings want those eggs for themselves.

programme.title: Happy Pawtomotiversary / Winner, Winner, Lasagna Dinner
programme.desc: Pawston is celebrating the 40th anniversary of Grandmaw and Grandpaws Pawtomotive Garage! As a surprise, Tag and Paw decide to track down items to recreate the garage to look like it did when it first opened while the rest of the family distract the Grandpawrents. / Tag and Wind face off in the Lasagna Games for a chance to be Sams new Crew Chief. A series of lasagna-themed games will challenge their speed, fix-it skills, and leadership. But there can only be one winner.

R and D Baby Simmons is reluctant to fix the model they have, which picks up signals from her favorite lvorian soap opera, "Bridges Aflame." With Boss Babys cover at stake, its up to the Templeton Family to get Benji out of their hair as he sniffs around for a case that could garner the attention from federal law enforcement.

programme.title: Gangster Hunt - Police Battle the Mafia

programme.title: First aid in an emergency
